text: Finally I got my certificate of diploma in business management and administration. I'm very happy because before this I didn't even thinking of improve myself because I originally thought I wasn't cut out for studying. It really helps me in my future career because at least there are more choices for me to choose. Overall Bizchamp college staffs are really helpful, they always gave me a hand when I met a problem. Thank you very much, and I will continue to upgrade my qualificationðŸ’ª

This is a very good and excellent college, but everything is not perfect. First of all, the teacher in charge of my course cannot speak clearly and can't pronounce clearly. Even in class, he talks about extracurricular topics and politics every day, and promotes the "advantages" of China every day. lastly, the time after school should be It's 10:00 pm and the teacher ends class at 9:49/50. I don't know if the money I pay every month is worth it...
The teacher is good and get certified that u can trusted . Good experience

A good college for learning new knowledge. Time is flexible and convenient for foreigner who work in Singapore. Courses are using Mandarin and English so that is one of the best parts which can easily to learning. Lecturers are friendly and passionate therefore the learning experience is excellent.

I am very grateful to all school personnel for their support and assistance. It allows me to complete more than a year of study. During this period, I learned a wealth of knowledge. A lot of gains! Thank you, teachers, for your patience and professional teaching! Thank you, school staff, for your helpâ€”especially Janet, very patient and gentle. When I face difficulties finding a job, she will do her best to help me find a job and give me a good reply every time I ask her questions. In these years, I appreciate all the leaders and staff of the school for giving me a lot of support and enhancing myself. Here, I wish every one of you a happy and smooth work.
